name: Math Blaster HyperBlast 2 HD
summary:
From the makers of the award winning Math Blaster series! Over 20 years making math fun! 
 
Hop on your HyperCycle and discover math facts like you’ve never seen them before! Race through levels shooting and dodging fast-flying obstacles to reach the Alien Boss! Use your math skills and smarts to battle and defeat the Alien Boss and unlock new weapons, ammo and more levels! 
 
Reviews: 
 
&9733; "Most importantly, this "edutainment" offering makes math fun by combining fast-action shooting sequences with elementary-level math problems." - USA Today 
 
&9733; "The fast pace of the tunnels and obstacles adds excitement to the game and breaks up the Math practice." - The iPhone Mom 
 
&9733; "I was instantly struck by how the math equations are programmed in to be a natural part of the game and not school like at all. If you know you’ll be spending time in the car this summer, Math Blaster HyperBlast is worth picking up." - Play That Now 
 
 
Addictive Features: 
 
&9733; 40 levels of mind-bending math! 
 
&9733; 6 subjects: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Fractions, and Standard Form 
 
&9733; 4 themed levels and Alien Bosses 
 
&9733; Available in English and Spanish! 
 
&9733; Amazing 3D graphics! 
 
&9733; Fast-paced arcade action! 
 
&9733; Kid-friendly controls and instructions! 
 
&9733; Brand New Achievements to master! 
 
&9733; Find and challenge your friends with the ALL-NEW BFF locator! 
 
If you like the game please take the time to rate it! 
 
Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). Will be used to notify of game fixes, updates, etc. along with allowing for future integration online. 
- Does NOT include ads 
- Does NOT link to Social networks 
- Does include links/information relative to other Knowledge Adventure games and apps 
- Does use analytics/data collection tools
